name: rvo-vsts-promotepackage-task
description: Promotes a package to a Release View in VSTS Package Management
author: Rene van Osnabrugge

inputs.name: feed
inputs.label: Use packages from this VSTS feed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Include the selected feed in the generated NuGet.config.

inputs.name: inputType
inputs.label: Package input type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Preferred input type. Either specify the name(s) and version explicitly, or retrieve name(s) and version(s) from metadata of package file(s).

options.packageFiles: Get name(s) and version(s) from metadata of package file(s)

inputs.name: packageIds
inputs.label: Package
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the package that you want to promote. Multiple packages may be supplied separated with a comma or semicolon. Note you may use either the name of the package or its GUID.

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Package Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter the version you want to promote or a [variable](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988).

inputs.name: packagesDirectory
inputs.label: Package source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source folder that the package file pattern(s) will be searched in.

inputs.name: packagesPattern
inputs.label: Package file paths
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file paths or glob pattern to match nupkg/tgz files within the package source folder containing the package name and versions (as metadata) that will be promoted. Multiple patterns can be separated by a semicolon or be placed on separate lines.

inputs.name: releaseView
inputs.label: Release Views
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the view to which to promote the package.
